entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
